Building Description:
The Capri Apartments in the Bronx feature a 24-hour doorman with a garage and on-site laundry. Enter a refined lobby furnished with contemporary details and modern decor. At our Grand Concourse apartments, you can even enjoy the luxury of having our doorman accept and store your packages until you're ready to pick up. Manhattan is only a few stops away and get out of the city quickly with easy access to the Cross Bronx Expressway.

Building Description:
If you're looking for NYC apartment rentals with stunning views and a short trip into Midtown, Gracie Court has got you covered! Nestled away at the peak of a hill where Riverside Drive becomes its narrowest, stands Gracie Court at 920 Riverside Drive. Enter a pristine marble lobby with exquisite handcrafted detail throughout the ceilings. This pre-war building offers spectacular views of the majestic Hudson River and George Washington Bridge. With easy access to major subway lines, this convenient location allows our tenants to get to midtown in fewer than 25 minutes. We take pride in keeping our grounds and facilities clean and secure. Work with Goldfarb Properties to live in and enjoy this prime Washington Heights real estate.

amenities.other: Bike Storage, Heat and Hot Water Included, Laundry, Pre-War, Smoke Free Building, Custom Kitchen Cabinetry, Hardwood Floors, Water views

Apartment Description:
Unit will be available for showings starting Nov 15th, 2018. Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process.

Building Description:
Fordham Terrace is located along the tree-lined street tucked away in a quiet atmosphere. Enter our newly redesigned entrance and lobby displaying contemporary finishes. You'll quickly notice the properties grounds are impeccably maintained and award the building an elegant ambiance. Enjoy easy access to Manhattan via the 4 train. Take advantage of our indoor garage parking providing residents easy access to local highways. Feel free to reach out about our apartments for rent in the Bronx.

amenities.other: Gas, Heat, Hot Water Included, Laundry, Playground Across the Street, Pets Not Permitted, Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances, Steps from the Park

details.description:
Apartment Description:
Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process.

Building Description:
Detailed with custom engraved pillars, Cedar Arms’ beautifully decorated lobbies are the perfect entrances to your new home. The buildings are delicately lined with maintained landscaping and shrubbery. The buildings’ units feature hardwood floors, bright kitchens, and beautiful natural scenery. Live directly next to the river, where you can enjoy waterfront river views. Cedar Arms Apartments feature on-site laundry facilities and live-in resident manager. Our apartments in the Bronx are conveniently located only steps away from local buses and walking distance from the Metro North and near the 1 and 4 trains - allowing you to access Manhattan in only 20 minutes.

amenities.other: Heat and Hot Water Included, Laundry, Pre-War, Pets Not Permitted, Frigidaire Appliances, Granite Countertops, Great Light, Great Views, Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances, Steps from the Park, Steps to Subway

Our building is conveniently located next to schools, restaurants and nearby transportation. Residents can walk to the local bus or nearby 1 and 4 trains that lead directly into Manhattan. The buildings’ units feature hardwood floors, spacious kitchens and beautiful river views. Catch a glimpse of outdoor beauty through your window while enjoying a brightly sunlit apartment. River Hill Gardens features an attended indoor garage and laundry facilities available to all tenants. Our apartments in the Bronx are maintained by live-in resident managers offering on-site maintenance and assistance.

details.description:
Apartment Description:
Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process. "Picture represent similar renovations and finishes."

Building Description:
Welcome to the The Grand Apartments in the Bronx, a 24-hour doorman building standing sixteen stories tall on the Grand Concourse. Enter a refined lobby furnished with contemporary details and modern decor. Enjoy a 24-hour on-site fitness center sporting new equipment and technology. Manhattan has never been closer with the D and B lines just steps away from this South Bronx real estate - allowing easy access to Manhattan in just 20 minutes. For Bronx-Lebanon employees your commute is a short 2-minute walk. Enjoy the luxury of having our doorman accept and store your packages until ready for pick up. Our Grand Concourse apartments provide an indoor garage that permits easy access to the Cross Bronx.

amenities.other: Air Conditioners Included, Cooking Gas Included, Heat Included, High Speed Internet, Laundry, On Site Security, Package Storage, Smoke Free Building, Brand New Lobby, Near Major Hospitals, Pets Not Permitted, Dining Area, Energy Star AC Units, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel Appliances, Steps from the Park, Steps to Subway

Apartment Description:
Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process. "Pictures represent similar renovations and finishes."

Building Description:
Perched on top of a hill lies River Hill Gardens, a serene community located adjacent to glistening waters. Our building is conveniently located next to schools, restaurants and nearby transportation. Residents can walk to the local bus or nearby 1 and 4 trains that lead directly into Manhattan. The buildings’ units feature hardwood floors, spacious kitchens and beautiful river views. Catch a glimpse of outdoor beauty through your window while enjoying a brightly sunlit apartment. River Hill Gardens features an attended indoor garage and laundry facilities available to all tenants. Our apartments in the Bronx are maintained by live-in resident managers offering on-site maintenance and assistance.

amenities.other: Heat and Hot Water Included, Laundry, Pets Not Permitted, Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances, Steps from the Park

details.description:
1 month(s) free on a 18 month lease rent is $4,225 net effective rent is $3,990. (promotions apply to new residents and immediate move in only)


Apartment Description:
No fee! Available 11/15. Newly Renovated oversized 1 bedroom apartment. 1 month free on a 18 month lease.

Building Description:
Park Towers South upper west side apartments illustrate beautifully-modern details with quality service, located perfectly in the center of the city. Our buildings exhibit a well-maintained interior with welcoming doormen who remain onsite 24 hours a day. Enjoy gorgeous apartments supplied with top appliances and modern designer finishes. Select apartments include spacious wraparound terraces with views of the city and immense sunlight. Park Towers South provides convenience to all parts of the city and is the perfect place to call your new home.

amenities.other: Central Air Conditioning, Laundry, Pets Not Permitted, Smoke Free Building, Yoga Classes , In-Home Package Delivery , Garden Courtyard , Custom Kitchen Cabinetry, Double-Pane City Windows, Marble Bathroom, Oak Strip Flooring

details.description:
1 month(s) free on a 18 month lease rent is $1,693 net effective rent is $1,599. (promotions apply to new residents and immediate move in only)


Apartment Description:
Unit will be available for showings starting November 15th, 2018. Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process.

Building Description:
Welcome to the The Grand Apartments in the Bronx, a 24-hour doorman building standing sixteen stories tall on the Grand Concourse. Enter a refined lobby furnished with contemporary details and modern decor. Enjoy a 24-hour on-site fitness center sporting new equipment and technology. Manhattan has never been closer with the D and B lines just steps away from this South Bronx real estate - allowing easy access to Manhattan in just 20 minutes. For Bronx-Lebanon employees your commute is a short 2-minute walk. Enjoy the luxury of having our doorman accept and store your packages until ready for pick up. Our Grand Concourse apartments provide an indoor garage that permits easy access to the Cross Bronx.

amenities.other: Air Conditioners Included, Cooking Gas Included, Heat Included, High Speed Internet, Laundry, On Site Security, Package Storage, Smoke Free Building, Brand New Lobby, Near Major Hospitals, Pets Not Permitted, Alcove Living Room, Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances, Steps from the Park, Steps to Subway

photo.description: The Grand - Living Room - GRC-L Line

Apartment Description:
Contact us for more information or apply online to begin the leasing process. "Pictures represent similar renovations and finishes."

Building Description:
The Capri Apartments in the Bronx feature a 24-hour doorman with a garage and on-site laundry. Enter a refined lobby furnished with contemporary details and modern decor. At our Grand Concourse apartments, you can even enjoy the luxury of having our doorman accept and store your packages until you're ready to pick up. Manhattan is only a few stops away and get out of the city quickly with easy access to the Cross Bronx Expressway.

amenities.other: Brand New Lobby, Heat and Hot Water Included, Laundry, Near Major Hospitals, On Site Security, Package Storage, Pets Not Permitted, Hardwood Floors, Steps from the Park
